question: You are a code expert, please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate, professional responses. Make sure the generated code is executable whenever possible. Please help me create a tool using HTML that generates text overlays for Xiaohongshu (Little Red Book) images. The entire code should be saved in a single HTML file.

checklist.title: Is the HTML image overlay tool fully implemented?
checklist.description: Review whether the code implements the core functionality of adding text overlays to images. Check if users can upload/select images, add text overlays with customization options, and save/export the final result. Score 0 if core functionality is missing, 5 if basic overlay is implemented but lacks customization, and 10 if all features are fully included with a Xiaohongshu-style aesthetic.

checklist.title: Are the text overlay customization options comprehensive?
checklist.description: Evaluate the range of text customization options available. Should include font selection (minimum 5 popular fonts), text color picker with opacity control, font size adjustment, text alignment, rotation, and shadow/highlight effects commonly seen in Xiaohongshu posts. Deduct 2 points for each missing essential customization feature. Full score for implementing all features plus popular Xiaohongshu-specific text styles as presets.

checklist.title: Is the image handling functionality complete?
checklist.description: Check if the tool allows for basic image operations: uploading from local storage, cropping/resizing to standard Xiaohongshu dimensions (3:4, 1:1, 4:3), basic filters similar to the platform, and brightness/contrast adjustments. Deduct 3 points if image upload is unreliable, 3 points if resizing/cropping is missing, and 4 points if no image enhancement features are available.

checklist.title: Is the export functionality properly implemented?
checklist.description: Verify if the tool can export the final image with text overlays in common formats (PNG/JPEG), preserving quality and transparency where needed. Check for proper file naming options and if image dimensions match Xiaohongshu's recommended specifications. Deduct 5 points if export produces visual artifacts, 3 points if limited format options, and 5 points if no download functionality.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code handles common abnormal situations (such as unsupported file types, oversized images, text overflow, browser compatibility issues). Code should provide friendly error messages and recovery mechanisms. Check for proper event handling and memory management when processing large images. Give 10 points for comprehensive error handling, 5 points for average robustness, 0 points if exceptions crash the application.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. Template library of popular Xiaohongshu text styles 2. Batch processing multiple images 3. AI-suggested text positioning 4. Social sharing integration). Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Redundant implementation of similar functions (e.g., multiple text editors coexisting) 2. Function modules unrelated to image text overlay (e.g., a built-in music player) 3. Fancy effects that affect performance (e.g., excessive animations that slow down the interface). Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core functions are interfered with by redundant code.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review modular design (such as separating UI/logic/data processing), code organization within the single HTML file (proper use of script sections, CSS organization), and efficient use of JavaScript libraries if included. Deduct 5 points if global namespace pollution is found; deduct 5 points if the code is difficult to maintain due to poor structure; deduct 5 points if the tool performs poorly on standard hardware. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the interface vision meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the overall design follows modern design principles and resembles Xiaohongshu's aesthetic: 1) Clean, feminine color palette with appropriate accent colors 2) Proper layout spacing with clear visual hierarchy 3) Professional typography that matches Xiaohongshu's style. Deduct 3 points for each misaligned element, 5 points for an inconsistent color scheme, and 5 points for poor typography choices. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the dynamic interaction smooth and seamless?
checklist.description: Judge whether the dynamic effects conform to human perception characteristics: 1) Real-time preview of text overlays as users type 2) Smooth dragging and positioning of text elements 3) Responsive design that works on various screen sizes including mobile devices (where most Xiaohongshu users create content). Deduct 5 points for laggy text editing, 3 points for jerky drag-and-drop functionality, and 5 points if the tool is unusable on mobile devices. The full score is 10 points.
